name: Pig Boy's Adventure - Demo
description:
Welcome to Pig Boy's Adventure! Be prepared to follow Pig Boy on an incredible journey, meeting lots of characters and friends!

This game was developed through our freshman-sophomore years of high school. It is satirical so don't take it too seriously!

Also, some parts a bit loud, so be aware!

We don't really have plans to continue this game, but we aim on releasing more serious games in the future!

Created by:

 DanWaur - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAfPpd8frEh-Jnd41ku9QuA

Telolmen - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiw0Hc3-PjZntq5KA44ymug
